content.question: The four graphs show the angular velocity <math alttext="omega" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>Ï‰</mi></mstyle></math> of identical disks as a function of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> over the same time interval. In which of the graphs is the disk in rotational equilibrium?

choices.label: Graphs <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>
Graphs <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> and <math alttext="4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn></math>

content.answer: Graphs <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>
